items.title: Beetroot fritters with soured cream & salmon tartare
items.description: Warm and crispy beetroot fritters pair perfectly with cold cream and delicate, raw salmon. A tasty starter or a light lunch that's rich in omega-3

image.alt: Beetroot fritters with soured cream & salmon tartare
image.title: Beetroot fritters with soured cream & salmon tartare

items.title: Beetroot burger
items.description: Looking for a vegan burger with bite and bags of flavour? Look no further – we’re confident that meat-eaters, veggies and vegans alike will love this beetroot burger recipe

items.title: Beetroot & feta pasta
items.description: Bring colour to your dinner table with our creamy beetroot and feta pasta. Packed with nutrients, it's a satisfying veggie lunch or supper for the family

image.alt: Beetroot & feta pasta served in 2 bowls
image.title: Beetroot & feta pasta

items.title: Beetroot & red onion tarte tatin
items.description: Try this vegan tart for a show-stopping centrepiece. The bold red of beetroot against the vibrant green salad also makes it ideal for a meat-free celebration.

image.alt: A plate serving beetroot & red onion tarte tatin
image.title: Beetroot & red onion tarte tatin

items.title: Beetroot hummus party platter
items.description: This one-platter-serves-all beetroot hummus will be a big hit, and doesn’t require any cooking

image.alt: Beetroot hummus party platter served with vegetables and toast
image.title: Beetroot hummus party platter

items.title: Beetroot risotto with feta
items.description: Have a beetroot in your veg box this week or growing some in the garden? Showcase beetroots at their best in this silky, colourful risotto with feta

image.alt: Beetroot risotto with feta in two bowls
image.title: Beetroot risotto with feta

items.title: Salt-baked beetroot with feta & pickled onions
items.description: The salt crust really intensifies the natural flavour of the beetroot as it steams in its own juices, seasoning it as it cooks

image.alt: Salt-baked beetroot with feta & pickled onions
image.title: Salt-baked beetroot with feta & pickled onions

items.title: Pickled beetroot
items.description: Preserve roasted beetroot in a sweet and spiced vinegar to make this punchy, classic accompaniment to cold meats and cheeses

items.title: Beetroot & onion seed soup
items.description: A deep red autumnal soup that's low fat, vegetarian and full of flavour. Beetroot and apple give this soup a subtle sweet flavour, while lentils add protein and bulk

items.title: Beetroot latkes
items.description: Make beetroot the star ingredient with these healthy latkes which provide three of your 5-a-day. The purple root is packed full of vitamin C and folate

items.title: Beetroot brownies
items.description: With around half the fat of regular brownies, these are a slightly less guilty pleasure, but still have that intense chocolate hit

items.title: Beetroot, hummus & crispy chickpea sub sandwich
items.description: Load up a sub with homemade hummus, beetroot, chickpeas and salad to make this filling vegan sandwich. An ideal lunch for when hunger strikes

image.alt: A beetroot, hummus & crispy chickpea sandwich with a knife alongside
image.title: A beetroot, hummus & crispy chickpea sandwich

items.title: Beetroot & lentil tabbouleh
items.description: Serve this tasty beetroot, chickpea and lentil tabbouleh as a side dish or vegan main. It's healthy, gluten-free, low-calorie and three of your five-a-day

image.alt: A dish serving beetroot & lentil tabbouleh
image.title: Beetroot & lentil tabbouleh

items.title: Beetroot & halloumi salad with pomegranate and dill
items.description: Make an easy salad with three of your 5-a-day. Halloumi with juicy pomegranate seeds and the crunch of pumpkin seeds is a moreish combination

image.alt: Beetroot salad topped with grilled halloumi on blue plate on yellow background
image.title: Beetroot & halloumi salad with pomegranate and dill

items.title: Cheat’s beetroot biriyani
items.description: Cook this beetroot biriyani and freeze the leftovers for busy weeknights. With colourful beetroot taking centre stage, it's full of spices and is a flavourful dish

image.alt: Cheat’s beetroot biriyani in a saucepan
image.title: Cheat’s beetroot biriyani

items.title: Beetroot falafel
items.description: Jazz up an all-time vegetarian favourite by adding vibrant beetroot - serve with tahini yoghurt dip and pickled beets

items.title: Creamy beetroot risotto
items.description: This vivid risotto is simply baked in the oven, so there's no need to spend lots of time at the stove stirring

items.title: Beetroot pancakes
items.description: Whizz beetroot into an easy batter to make these bright purple pancakes, then top with a warm fruit compote for a hearty weekend brunch. You can use this recipe to make blini-style canapés, too.

items.title: Salmon with beetroot, feta & lime salsa
items.description: Rustle up this tasty salmon dish with just four ingredients. Ideal for a quick and easy midweek meal with a tasty feta and beetroot salsa on the side

image.alt: A plate serving salmon with beetroot, feta & lime salsa
image.title: Salmon with beetroot, feta & lime salsa

items.title: Roasted cod with zingy beetroot salad
items.description: Make the most of the colour and flavour of beetroot with our easy roasted cod served on a beetroot, new potato and carrot salad with a lovely zingy dressing

image.alt: One serving of roasted cod with zingy beetroot salad
image.title: Roasted cod with zingy beetroot salad

items.title: Beetroot, cumin & coriander soup with yogurt and hazelnut dukkah
items.description: Our easy beetroot soup is spiced with cumin and coriander and topped with crunchy hazelnut dukkah. Try this simple, healthy recipe for a filling lunch

image.alt: Beetroot soup with yogurt in bowl
image.title: Beetroot, cumin & coriander soup with yogurt and hazelnut dukkah

items.title: Warm beet, chorizo & pear salad
items.description: Combine succulent pear, colourful beetroot, spicy chorizo and buttery manchego cheese in this vibrant winter salad that's ideal for sharing with friends

items.title: Chargrilled mackerel with sweet & sour beetroot
items.description: Fresh mackerel is always a winner and grilling gives a deliciously charred quality. Pickled beetroot wedges add an extra tang in this party-perfect, budget-savvy starter

image.alt: Chargrilled mackerel with sweet & sour beetroot
image.title: Chargrilled mackerel with sweet & sour beetroot

items.title: Porridge with beetroot, apple & cranberry compote & toasted hazelnuts
items.description: Finish creamy oats with a subtly spiced, fruity topping of cinnamon, cardamom and maple syrup for a warming breakfast or weekend brunch

image.alt: Porridge with beetroot, apple & cranberry compote & toasted hazelnuts
image.title: Porridge with beetroot, apple & cranberry compote & toasted hazelnuts

items.title: Beautiful beetroot & feta patties
items.description: Tasting great and and bringing a vibrant purple to your plate, these beetroot & feta patties will make the perfect lunch or light dinner

items.title: Beetroot, lentil, celeriac & hazelnut salad
items.description: A lovely, wintry salad using fresh, seasonal ingredients that you can serve warm or cold. Bright beetroot, crunchy hazelnuts and a punchy mustard dressing

items.title: Shukhi – warm beetroot & mushroom salad
items.description: This Ukrainian dish is traditionally eaten at Christmas - serve on toasted rye bread for a crostini-like starter or party canapé

items.title: Beetroot soup with feta, radish & croutons
items.description: Blitz this vibrant vegetarian soup to a smooth consistency, then serve hot or cold, with raw radishes and toasted sourdough for added crunch

image.alt: Beetroot soup with feta, radish & croutons
image.title: Beetroot soup with feta, radish & croutons

items.title: Roasted beetroot with za’atar, chickpeas & harissa yogurt
items.description: This light coating of Middle Eastern spice adds flavour to earthy roasted beetroot - a satisfying vegetarian supper for two

image.alt: Roasted beetroot with za’atar, chickpeas & harissa yogurt
image.title: Roasted beetroot with za’atar, chickpeas & harissa yogurt

items.title: Summer rarebit
items.description: Goat's cheese, cider and grated beetroot take this classic Welsh version of cheese on toast to the next level

items.title: Pan-fried mackerel fillets with beetroot & fennel
items.description: Mackerel fillets contain beneficial fats, are quick to cook, and really complement this earthy and vibrant salad with a yogurt dressing

image.alt: Pan-fried mackerel fillets with beetroot & fennel
image.title: Pan-fried mackerel fillets with beetroot & fennel

items.title: Beetroot rosti with green yogurt & smoked salmon
items.description: Enjoy these colourful beetroot rostis with smoked salmon, poached eggs and herb yogurt. They make a fabulous weekend brunch, lunch or supper

image.alt: Beetroot rosti with green yogurt & smoked salmon on a plate
image.title: Beetroot rosti with green yogurt and smoked salmon

items.title: Beetroot, feta & grain salad
items.description: Turn a pouch of cooked grains, plus three other ingredients, into an easy, vibrant vegetarian meal in just two minutes!

items.title: Honey-roasted beetroot & carrots
items.description: Roasting root vegetables in a sweet balsamic glaze brings out their natural sweetness - finish with herbs and seeds for a sensational side

items.title: Zesty beetroot with watercress
items.description: Add a splash of vibrant colour to a midweek meal with this unusual side salad

items.title: Spiced sweet & sour pickled beetroot
items.description: Forget crinkle-cut versions, this light pickle is sweet and rich - perfect with cold meats, salads and punchy cheeses

items.title: Better beetroot brownies
items.description: Nutritious beetroot adds sweetness and juiciness to this healthier squidgy chocolate traybake. Swap butter for rapeseed oil to lower the saturated fat too

items.title: Gratin of fresh & smoked salmon, beetroot, potatoes & dill
items.description: Impress family and friends with our Scandinavian-inspired gratin with salmon, beetroot, potatoes and dill; a comforting bake that's perfect for entertaining

image.alt: Gratin of fresh & smoked salmon, beetroot, potatoes & dill served in a casserole dish
image.title: Gratin of fresh & smoked salmon, beetroot, potatoes & dill

items.title: Marinated beetroot with grilled goat's cheese
items.description: Earthy beetroot works perfectly with creamy goat's cheese for an easy but impressive starter

image.alt: Marinated beetroot with grilled goat's cheese
image.title: Marinated beetroot with grilled goat's cheese

items.title: Pollock, beetroot & potato traybake with lemony crème fraîche
items.description: This white fish is sustainable and cheaper than cod - serve it with fresh lemon dipping sauce and root veg

image.alt: Pollock, beetroot & potato traybake with lemony crème fraîche
image.title: Pollock, beetroot & potato traybake with lemony crème fraîche

items.title: Beetroot egg salad tartine
items.description: Liven up your lunch or supper with this flavourful beetroot egg salad tartine with spring onions and cornichons. It's super simple to make

items.title: Beetroot & chocolate cake
items.description: Beetroot is actually very sweet and keeps this rich chocolate loaf wonderfully moist

items.title: Minted lamb burgers with beetroot mayo
items.description: Lamb and mint is a classic flavour combination, made even better with contrasting beetroot relish

image.alt: Herby lamb burgers with beetroot mayo
image.title: Herby lamb burgers with beetroot mayo

items.title: Warm mackerel & beetroot salad
items.description: A simple but flavoursome salad that's easily made for two or more people

items.title: Beet & caramelised onion tart
items.description: A great make-ahead vegetarian main that is much easier than it looks, from Trill Farm in Devon

items.title: Beetroot hummus
items.description: This freezable hummus is a great way of using up a glut of beetroot and makes a vibrant, healthy snack

items.title: Smoked salmon with beetroot & vodka crème fraîche
items.description: A hit of vodka gives this classic a new edge. Serve with a shot of vodka for full effect

image.alt: Smoked salmon with beetroot & vodka crème fraîche
image.title: Smoked salmon with beetroot & vodka crème fraîche

items.title: Spiced beetroot & orange chutney
items.description: Serve this vividly coloured chutney with cheeses and cold meats - great to give as a gift, too

items.title: Beef & beetroot curry
items.description: This vibrant purple root adds a welcome dash of colour and some healthy nutrients to an Indian spice pot

items.title: Beetroot shots with tarragon yogurt ice cubes
items.description: Sounds weird - tastes delicious - perfect for those hard to impress guests

image.alt: Beetroot shots with tarragon yogurt ice cubes
image.title: Beetroot shots with tarragon yogurt ice cubes

items.title: Hot beetroot salad
items.description: Bursting with goodness, this vegetarian side dish is a great addition to a winter main

items.title: Crunchy beetroot slaw with grilled chicken
items.description: This sweet, earthy salad makes a great healthy accompaniment to chicken or salmon

image.alt: Crunchy beetroot slaw with grilled chicken
image.title: Crunchy beetroot slaw with grilled chicken

items.title: Ham & beetroot salad bowl
items.description: A great light lunchtime salad that uses everyday ingredients in a new and interesting way

items.title: Balsamic beetroot with Roquefort
items.description: This sweet and savoury starter from Gordon Ramsay is perfect for a special summer dinner party

items.title: Steak, beetroot, horseradish & warm lentil salad
items.description: Get four of your 5-a-day in one meal from this steak, beetroot and lentil salad. As well as being super-nutritious, it only takes 20 minutes to make

image.alt: Steak, beetroot, horseradish & warm lentil salad served on a plate
image.title: Steak, beetroot, horseradish & warm lentil salad

items.title: Beet, spinach & goat’s cheese couscous
items.description: Perfect for packed lunches, this colourful, filling salad transports really well

items.title: Beetroot & mozzarella salad with maple dressing
items.description: Showcase quality ingredients in this contrasting salad - white Spanish anchovies work with creamy cheese and a sweet dressing

image.alt: Beetroot & mozzarella salad with maple dressing
image.title: Beetroot & mozzarella salad with maple dressing

items.title: Mustardy salmon with beetroot & lentils
items.description: Cook a delicious gluten-free dinner in 20 minutes. Our Scandi-style salmon is served with beetroot, lentils, pumpkin seeds, capers, mustard and dill

image.alt: Mustardy salmon with beetroot & lentils served on a plate with lemon wedges
image.title: Mustardy salmon with beetroot & lentils

items.title: Beetroot, grape & apple relish
items.description: Make this sweet, tangy relish up to two weeks in advance so it's ready for your Christmas cheeseboard. It's a great partner to hard cheeses like cheddar or aged gouda

image.alt: Beetroot, grape & apple relish served in a jar
image.title: Beetroot, grape & apple relish

items.title: Beetroot & blackberry cured salmon
items.description: Curing your own salmon is well worth it for taste and wow-factor. Serve this beetroot and berries version as a starter or on crackers as a canapé

image.alt: Beetroot & blackberry cured salmon served on a plate with dill and sourdough crackers
image.title: Beetroot & blackberry cured salmon

items.title: Roasted beetroot & goat's cheese salad
items.description: Tangy balsamic vinegar, sweet beetroot and creamy goat's cheese combine beautifully in this easy vegetarian salad that's sure to impress, containing four of your five-a-day

items.title: Beetroot & rye tartines
items.description: If you're keen to rustle up lighter party nibbles for a celebration, these low-calorie beetroot tartines with pastrami or mackerel are ideal

image.alt: Beetroot & rye tartines served on a large plate
image.title: Beetroot & rye tartines

items.title: Beetroot orzotto
items.description: Orzo is a small pasta shape that looks like a grain of rice and has a velvety texture similar to risotto when cooked- try it out in this Italian-inspired dish

items.title: Blood beetroot cocktails
items.description: This blood-red lemonade and Prosecco combo is sure to be your new favourite spooky tipple

items.title: Beetroot & shallot tatins
items.description: Bursting with colour and flavour, these beetroot & shallot tatins made with puff pastry will make a delicious lunch or light dinner

items.title: Creamy beetroot hummus
items.description: This delicious dip is ready in 10 minutes - pack along with vegetable sticks or pitta bread for a portable picnic snack

items.title: Heirloom beetroot & feta salad
items.description: A simple side salad of vibrant beets with salty feta cheese and a lemon vinaigrette

items.title: Blackberry & beetroot smoothie
items.description: Ginger, cinnamon and nutmeg give this beetroot and blackberry smoothie a warm kick - perfect for a morning or afternoon pick-me-up
